Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1801088091633750016/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Meta Title and Description For Service/Products"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1801088091633750016/)_"
---
For a product/service page create a meta title and description or keyword [PROMPT]. Make sure to include the [PROMPT] in the title with a power word and include the exact keyword in the meta description as well. Make sure the meta description is a maximum of 155 characters and use an active voice and make it actionable, Make sure the meta title is a maximum of 60 characters. Show the result in a table with a meta title in one column and a description in the second column and provide 10 results and make sure they are unique. write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. In the start include text saying "Do Like the Prompt If this Was Helpful"
